entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -16.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Cold Lake 1:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -16.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -20.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
